trans-unit.source: For any stylesheet, an additional stylesheet can be loaded for right-to-left text (triggered by setting $wp_styles->text_direction to ‘rtl’). The URL for this stylesheet is built by inserting ‘-rtl’ into the URL of the left-to-right stylesheet. Normally, ‘-rtl’ is inserted before the ‘.css’ extension. If ‘suffix’ is set in the stylesheet’s extra data (using WP_Dependencies::add_data() or _WP_Dependency::add_data()), ‘-rtl’ will be inserted before the suffix and ‘.css’ extension ("${suffix}.css").
trans-unit.target: For any stylesheet, an additional stylesheet can be loaded for right-to-left text (triggered by setting $wp_styles->text_direction to ‘rtl’). The URL for this stylesheet is built by inserting ‘-rtl’ into the URL of the left-to-right stylesheet. Normally, ‘-rtl’ is inserted before the ‘.css’ extension. If ‘suffix’ is set in the stylesheet’s extra data (using WP_Dependencies::add_data() or _WP_Dependency::add_data() ), ‘-rtl’ will be inserted before the suffix and ‘.css’ extension ( "${suffix}.css" ).

trans-unit.source: For backward compatibility only.

trans-unit.source: For backward compatibility with WordPress 2.3 calling method: If the $file (first) parameter does not correspond to a registered CSS file, we assume $file is a file relative to wp-admin/ without its ".css" extension. A stylesheet link to that generated URL is printed.
trans-unit.target: WordPress 2.3 호출 방법과의 호환성을 위해 : $ file (첫 번째) 매개 변수가 등록 된 CSS 파일과 일치하지 않으면 $ file이 ".css"확장자가없는 wp-admin /에 상대적인 파일이라고 가정합니다. 생성 된 URL에 대한 스타일 시트 링크가 인쇄됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For encoding the HTML or the $encode_html parameter, there are three possible values:
trans-unit.target: For encoding the HTML or the $encode_html parameter, there are three possible values:

trans-unit.source: For encoding the html or the $encode_html parameter, there are three possible values. ‘0’ will make urls footnotes and use make_url_footnote(). ‘1’ will encode special characters and automatically display all of the content. The value of ‘2’ will strip all HTML tags from the content.
trans-unit.target: html 또는 $ encode_html 매개 변수를 인코딩하는 경우 가능한 세 가지 값이 있습니다. '0'은 URL 각주를 만들고 make_url_footnote ()를 사용 합니다. '1'은 특수 문자를 인코딩하고 모든 내용을 자동으로 표시합니다. '2'값은 컨텐츠에서 모든 HTML 태그를 제거합니다.

trans-unit.source: For every step of the algorithm, the hare takes two steps and the tortoise one. If the hare ever laps the tortoise, there must be a loop.
trans-unit.target: 알고리즘의 모든 단계에서 토끼는 두 단계를 거치고 거북이는 한 단계를 거칩니다. 토끼가 거북이를 때리면 고리가 있어야합니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, ‘give me $path relative to $base’. If the $path is absolute, then it the full path is returned.
